value:
$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|Hey, we're not done with our
training yet! We've got another
round to go!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Hello... I know we're in the middle
of a battlefield, but I was hoping—$k$p$WmMPID_忍者シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_F_Ninja21,Face|What's that? Are you two here
to back us up?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Ninja21,Face|Fighting alongside another version of
myself is a new experience for me,
but...it will make for quite a display!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者シノン,ch11_24_Chinon_M_Ninja21,Face|...Who let a child onto the battlefield?
Make sure you keep up, little girl.
I won't be slowing down.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Ninja21,Face|This will certainly be a battle to look
back on fondly. Let's make our future
selves proud while we can!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_比翼カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|Hm... Fascinating. We should discuss
this further in the future...$k$pBut for now, I must be going.
It was a pleasure meeting you.$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Ugh. You call that mystique? Where
was the...MYSTIQUE part? I didn't
even have a chance to strike!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Oh, right... I suppose I was so caught
up in conversation that I forgot what
we were doing...$k$pBut I met a lot of different people,
and I had fun in the process, so that's
a plus!$k$pOh right! One of the merchants gave
me some free snacks from their stall!
Do you...want a bite?$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Hmph! Maybe there is something to
be said for talking to people rather
than trying to sneak-attack them...$k$pOr maybe we're just not cut out
to be ninja in the same way the
others are.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Maybe... But who says there's only
one right way to be a ninja?$k$pAll we have to do is figure out our
unique strengths, and then leverage
them...against bad guys!$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Our own unique strengths, hm?
Oh! I've got the perfect thing!$k$pWe're sisters, right? I don't know
of any other ninja-sister duos...
That's unique for sure!$k$pWe're the Ninja Sisters of Nohr!
Concealed Chameleon Crawl! YAH!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Oh, no you don't! Get back here!
Tracking Tiger Tackle!$k$p$Sbs150|
